name: Knight
description: The Knight is a brave warrior from the kingdom. Good attack and resists but slow speed.

name: Mage
description: The Mage is a master of all things arcane. High attack but low armour. Average speed.

name: Juggernaut
description: The Juggernaut is a renowned fighter, best known for his unrelenting strength. High attack and high defence, but abysmal speed.

name: Assassin
description: The Assassin is a criminal, armed with a dagger, dealing extremely high damage and having extremely high speed, but very low defence.

name: Tank
description: The Tank is a reliable frontliner, extremely high defence but with low attack and speed.
